title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 17 - Requirements For The Labeling Of, And Definitions And Standards Of Identity For, Milk, Milk Products And Frozen Desserts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 17 - Requirements For The Labeling Of, And Definitions And Standards Of Identity For, Milk, Milk Products And Frozen Desserts

§ 17.1 - Definitions
§ 17.2 - Flavored dairy drink: identity
§ 17.3 - Whole milk ricotta cheese; identity
§ 17.4 - Part skim ricotta cheese; identity
§ 17.5 - Ricotta, ricotone or whey cheeses; identity
§ 17.6 - Dairy shake: identity; label statement
§ 17.7 - Melloream shake: identity; label statement
§ 17.8 - Frozen yogurt: identity; label statement
§ 17.9 - Quiescently frozen confection: identity; label statement
§ 17.10 - Quiescently frozen dairy confection: identity; label statement
§ 17.11 - Manufactured desserts mix: identity; label statement
§ 17.12 - Freezer-made milk shake; freezer-made shake: identities; label statements
§ 17.13 - Parevine: identity; label statement
§ 17.14 - Lo-mel: identity; label statement
§ 17.15 - Frozen pudding: identity; label statement
§ 17.16 - Generic frozen dessert: identity; label statement
§ 17.17 - Frozen dessert mix: identity; label statement
§ 17.18 - Additional standards of identity for milk and milk products
§ 17.19 - Additional standards of identity for frozen desserts
§ 17.20 - Requirements applicable to the labeling of milk, milk products and frozen desserts
§ 17.21 - Repealed
§ 17.22 to 17.42 - Repealed
§ 17.43 - Renumbered
§ 17.44 - Renumbered

Notes

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 46, 46-a, 50-k, 71-a, 71-n, 214-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
